actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to amend subsection 31(e) of the Mineral Leasing Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Mineral Leasing Act to repeal the requirement that notice of a proposed oil or gas lease reinstatement be submitted to certain congressional committees prior to actual reinstatement.

titles.title: A bill to amend subsection 31(e) of the Mineral Leasing Act, and for other purposes.
